mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT C.CNO CNO , C.MNO MNO , C.TNO TNO , C.CPRICE CPRICE , C.CADDRESS CADDRESS , C.CCONTENT CCONTENT , C.DELETEYN DELETEYN , C.INSERTDATE INSERTDATE , C.UPDATEDATE UPDATEDATE , M.MID MID , M.MNAME MNAME , CEIL(ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY C.CNO DESC)/ #{pageSize, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) pageSize , COUNT(C.CNO) OVER() AS totalCount FROM CONDITION C, MEMBER M WHERE C.MNO = M.MNO AND C.TNO = #{tno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY C.CNO DESC ) WHERE pageSize = #{curPage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
